subject: Simsonn Pro Pedals and Pro Plus Pedals Upgrade Kit
description_text:
Hi,

Are there any instructions on how to perform the pedal upgrade please?

Kind regards,
Del.

conversations.body_text: Hi Del Attipoe,  The main upgrades are the realistic hydraulic system and damping system. You can refer to the introduction of the Pro Plus upgrade for more details.

Hello,

I have been following and have the new damper on but I'm not sure what the
spacer/bearing combination should be for the top anchor or the throttle
spring rod.

Thank you,
Del.

On Wed, 4 Jun 2025 at 13:59, service@simsonn.com
Hi Del Attipoe,  Have you already made the purchase? The product should come with a user manual included.

Yes I purchased the pedal upgrade kit for my Simsonn Pros, it's come with
the new springs, dampers etc but there was no user manual

On Wed, 4 Jun 2025 at 14:08, service@simsonn.com
Hi Del Attipoe,  Please feel free to refer to this and give it a try!       https://cdn.simsonn.vip/download/SIMSONN_Plus_X_EN.pdf
